Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

Lundy, S.A. and W.I. McLaughlin, American Institute of Aeronautics and Astronautics 17th Aerospace Sciences Meeting, AIAA-79-0125, 1979.

Neugebauer, G., H.J. Habing, R. van Duinen, H.H. Aumann, B. Baud, C.A. Beichman, D.A. Beintema, N. Boggess, P.E. Clegg, T. de Jong, J.P. Emerson, T.N. Gautier, F.C. Gillett, S. Harris, M.G. Hauser, J.R. Houck, R.E. Jennings, F.J. Low, P.L. Marsden, G. Miley, F.M. Olnon, S.R. Pottasch, E. Raimond, M. Rowan-Robinson, B.T. Soifer, R.G. Walker, P.R. Wesselius, and E. Young, The Infrared Astronomical Satellite (IRAS) Mission, Astrophysica Journal 278, L1-L6, 1984.

Data_Set_PDS3.citation_text: Sykes M.V., T.L. Brown, and A.C. Raugh, IRAS POSITION AND POINTING V1.1, IRAS-6-SDR-SATELLITE-STATUS-V1.1, NASA Planetary Data System, 1997.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_terse_desc: Spacecraft position vectors and individual scan parameters for the IRAS mission.
Data_Set_PDS3.abstract_desc: Spacecraft position vectors and individual scan parameters for the IRAS mission.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_desc:
Data Set Overview ================= This data presented with this data set include
IRASPOS.TAB - The IRAS Position File describes the position of the satellite in its orbit about the Earth at 200-second intervals in heliocentric ecliptic rectangular coordinates (B1950), where the X axis points to the First Point of Ares. In addition an Earth ephemeris is also included, which was generated by Miles Standish at JPL using the information that was available in 1983 to best approximate the knowledge of the Earth's position that was used in the reduction of the IRAS data. Finally, the geocentric position of the satellite is calculated using the above information.
SCAN.TAB - The IRAS Scan History File describes the pointing geometry and length of each survey-mode scan (by SOP OBS) over the entire mission.
Modification History ==================== As part of a general review of holdings in February 2002, the labels and catalog files associated with this data set underwent minor editing to bring them up to current PDS and SBN standard. No data files were changed during this editing process.
Data_Set_PDS3.confidence_level_note:
Review ====== IRASPOS.TAB underwent peer review on March 24, 1997.
SCAN.TAB was peer reviewed on April 26, 1993, and updated on March 24, 1997.
